short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your JIRA backlog into a blackhole

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does your JIRA backlog feels like it never ends? Does it keep growing and growing and growing? Then this extension is for you - now you can turn your backlog into a blackhole!

Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with Atlassian or any of their products. I just had some spare time.
